item.title: Arduino Robust Serial
item.description: Robust Arduino Serial is a simple and robust serial communication protocol. It was designed to make two Arduinos communicate, but can also be useful when you want a computer (e.g. a Raspberry Pi) to communicate with an Arduino. Please read the Medium Article to have an overview of this protocol. Implementations are available in various programming languages: Arduino (arduino-serial/ folder) Python C++ Rust
